\em{My} is a possessive pronoun, which takes the place of a noun and modifies another noun (or pronoun).

One city and five countries — Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Indonesia, Papua New Guinea and San Diego, California — have already declared a state of emergency due to the El Niño, while the United Nations has deployed emergency resources to a further 10 countries.,ပါပူဝါနယူးဂီနီ နှင့် အမေရိကန်နိုင်ငံ ကယ်လီဖိုးနီးယားပြည်နယ်ရှိ ဆန်ဒီယာဂိုမြို့တို့တွင် အရေးပေါ်အခြေအနေကို ကြောညာလိုက်ကြပြီဖြစ်ပြီး ကမ္ဘာကုလသမဂ္ဂအနေဖြင့်လည်း နောက်ထက် နိုင်ငံ ၁၀ နိုင်ငံတွင် အရေးပေါ်လုပ်ငန်းစဉ်များကို စီမံဆောင်ရွက်ထားပြီး ဖြစ်သည်။,"A cidade e cinco países — Colômbia, Equador, Peru, Indonésia, Nova Guiné do Pacífico e São Diego, Califórnia — já declararam um estado de emergência devido ao El Nino, enquanto as Nações Unidas estão desplegando recursos emergenciais para mais dez países.

Allow DAO use,DAO အသုံးပြုမှုကိုခွင့်ပြု,"Allowed DAO to use

\item ""Allow"" is an adjective, not a noun, so you can't use it as a subject of a sentence. It needs to be followed by a verb or a prepositional phrase. In this case, I would say ""You are allowed to use DAO"", but that doesn't sound quite right either. So I would go with something like ""You have permission to use [DAO]"".
The word ""use"" is a transitive verb, which means it",0.41,1.11

\item Use `str.translate(None, 'a-zA-Z')` to remove all non-alphanumeric characters from the input string. This will leave you with just the words.
You can then use `re.findall` to find all the words in the string and replace them with their translation.",0.00,0.00

Pop up notifications if the chat isn't focused,စကားပြောရာ တစ်ခုတည်း မဟုတ်လျှင် အသိပေးချက်များ ပွင့်ထွက်ပါ,"Pop-up notícias se o chat não estiver focado

\item ""Pop up"" is an idiomatic expression in English, so you can't translate it word for word. The closest translation would be ""\em{Mostrar uma notificação}"" (show a notification), but that doesn't make much sense in Portuguese.
The best way to go about this is to use Google Translate to get the gist of the sentence, and then rephrase it in your own words. In this case, I",0.00,0.00
